TopicTitle: Modded game crash when changing scenes

Articles.Content:
First of all, pardon me for my poor English spell and grammar.

Mods I use

Spoiler

[x] Science! Continued (xScienceContinued 5.26)
Airplane Plus (AirplanePlus 26.5)
AtmosphereAutopilot (Fly-By-Wire) (AtmosphereAutopilot v1.5.16)
Better Order of Parts: Numbered  (BOPN) (BOPN 3.1)

BetterCrewAssignment (BetterCrewAssignment 1.4.1)

Strategia (Strategia 1.8.0)
Toolbar (Toolbar 1:1.8.0.5)

Trajectories (Trajectories v2.4.0)

Zero MiniAVC (ZeroMiniAVC 1:1.1.0.1)

Unfortunately, this crash didn't produce any dump files. But Almost All of my crash is about UnityPlayer.dll.And They all try to use the function NvCloth.For example here is the dump file analysis in Crash_2021-02-18_175714281

For I understand NvCloth is a kind of cloth solver for Nvidia graphics card. I suspect that some of those mods are using the NvCloth function. This kind of crash only happens when changing scenes. So is there some way to solve that?

Edited February 19, 2021 by VladimirK
